content: I like these ideas, especially the guided tours and animal encounters. For the tours, I was thinking of having Tom, our farmhand, lead the tours since he's very knowledgeable about the farm's daily operations. As for the animal encounters, I'll make sure to have a variety of animals available, including the new Nigerian Dwarf goats I'm planning to purchase soon. By the way, speaking of new additions, I'm really happy with the new water buckets I got for the cowshed. I ordered them last Wednesday, and they're doing a great job.
